Part1:简介
这个故事我想告诉你是悲惨的，邪恶的，可怕的。我是谁，我来自哪里并不重要。当你读到这时,我将永远消失。
这一切开始于那年轻人走到我和约翰面前的那一天。他是一个新的玩家,不知道所有的Minecraft基础知识。我教他如何合成，挖矿，建筑。他是一个学得很快的学生。但那悲惨的一天来了.....

Part2:课程
那年轻人曾在挖矿,然后他问自己,如果我一直挖下去会发生什么?没有人知道不应该这么做,所以那个年轻人继续挖下去,然后他直跌到熔岩。我和约翰从地上听到他的尖叫声,每个人都哀悼他并吸取教训。

原文:
Part 1: The Introduction
The story I am about to tell you is tragic, evil, and horrifying. Who I am and where I'm from does not matter. I shall be long gone when you read this.

It all started the day when young Perrson walked up to me and John. He was a new player, and didn't know the basics of minecraft. So I taught him how to craft, mine, and build. He was a fast learning student. But then the tragic day came.....


Part 2: The Lesson
Young Perrson was mining, then thought to himself, what if I dig straight down. Nobody knew not to do it, so Perrson did it, Then he fell straight into lava. Me and John could hear his shrieks from above the ground. Everyone mourned and learned from/for Perrson.
